Nigam

Dental Clinic

We take your dental health seriously

About Us

Dr. Anant Gopal Nigam is one of the most popular dentists in the city, of Ajmer. Understanding that tooth-related issues can be scary for many, we have a very calm approach when treating patients which helps keep them calm. The dental facility stands located near Mayoor School which makes it hassle-free for people from near and far alike to visit and consult us.
Dr. Nigam Dental Medical Clinic in Ajmer holds immense popularity in the city for being a dental facility equipped with advanced dental equipment for better treatment of patients. Right from regular dental check-ups and cleaning to more serious dental procedures, we ensure every single issue is tackled with care and in a way that the patient feels at ease. A waiting area and a dedicated consultation area ensure the patients feel at ease. Apart from the tooth and gum issues, the suggestions given by us for maintaining proper dental health prove to be quite effective. Post-treatment care and prevention are given equal importance as that given to the procedures.

Our Services

Dental Implants

Loss of tooth in an individual is a very unfortunate incident irrespective of age as the patient not only is unable to eat comfortably as he was eating previously but it is a great psychological impact as well.
Replacement of teeth has been done since ages and the various ways of replaceing the teeth included removable partial/ complete dentures followed by fixed partial dentures followed by conventional implants.
Implants till now generally has been used as conventional implants in which the elaborate surgical procedure and waiting time of 3-4 months was required and then the final prosthesis was given.
Now with the advent of basal imlants this extreme surgical requirement and the waiting period of 3 to 4 months is reduced to three days and the subsequent final results are even more better as compared to conventional implants.
